mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lost_found_animals ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_found_animals (board_type, title, content, animal_type, gender, age, location, event_date, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, view_count, like_count) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{animalType}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{location}, #{eventDate}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_found_animals SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lost_found_animals SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment_file (board_type, board_id, file_name, file_path, file_type) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attachment_file WHERE board_type = 'lostfound' AND board_id = #{animalId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attachment_file WHERE board_id = #{animalId} AND board_type = 'lostfound'
